value.title: Upgrade Classic workspace to the new Workspaces in Power BI
value.excerpt: Upgrade Classic workspace to the new Workspaces in Power BI In this video, we will learn, how we can upgrade our old classic workspaces to the new Workspaces in Power BI.  The new workspaces have more granular roles so that you can better manage access to the content.  Here, we will talk the step by

value.title: What is Power BI Shared Datasets? How to user to develop Multiple Reports using Single Dataset?

value.title: 3 steps to do an IT Admin Takeover for Power BI and Office 365

I walk through the 3 main steps to perform the takeover. Doing the takeover doesn't cost you anything. For more detail on the cost of Power

value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want
